subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: CJM Racing, which had 12 top-10 finishes in the Nationwide Series last season, has suspended operations. The team owners Tony and Bryan Mullet said they would not race in 2010. Denny Hamlin and Scott Lagasse Jr. drove for CJM last season.
